reviews.review: Great game, some bugs but very fun nonetheless

This game could be so good...
The idea is great, it's fun to play, but here comes "The Community".
Dead by Daylight has the most toxic community I know. The report system is simply useless. It looks like the developers doing nothing to get rid of toxicity.
The game gets worse with every rank you climb up.
"MMR" is just complete mess in this game.
Unfortunately, DBD is clearly survivor sided when killer is supposed to be the power role, and becomes more survivor sided with every update.

Highly addictive but there are serious gameplay flaws and bugs that the devs take ages to fix...
Very fun. But because the game is old some people have a lot more experience than you and just bully you if you play the killer which makes the killer role really not fun to learn.

Команда разработчиков выжимает последние соки из игры, забирает последние деньги из работяг на свои бесконечные скины и однотипные дополнения. Еще при этом умудряются ломать игру с бесконечными загрузками, рассинхроном и ударами через доски, что просто уже надоело. Нерф любимых перков и манов из-за визга новичков, что якобы они вносят дизбаланс в игру, а по факту потакая их визгам, команда студии Бихавиор лишь доламывают игру, дизбалансом то в одну сторону, то в другую. Игра задуманная как хоррор, уже давно вышла за его рамки, но увы это еще не поняли разрабы и делают какую то хрень: скины например - скин доставщика пиццы? Очень по хрестианске очень в стиле кооперативной страшилки. 
Покупать не рекомендую, лучше на эти деньги купите что-нибудь стоящее: там гречки или туалетки скоро обосралипсис, в дбд кста уже наступил
pomysł na grę jest bardzo fajny
หัวร้อนกับการล้มไม้ดี

I have a love hate relationship with this game.  Needs more work for the killer to survivor hitboxes, but the overall fun factor is immeasurable.  It's really fun with SWF.  Don't let other players toxic attitudes detract you from playing this alone.  The community can be toxic, but you get what you put in.

Советую поиграть, если вам нужно решиться на самоубийство

Não recomendo esse jogo pelo simples fato de que quase todas as partidas do jogo são instáveis, sempre alguém vai levar disconnect sem qualquer motivo aparente. Além claro dos vários bugs que o jogo apresenta.
有趣，就是打了一下午逃生者把把被杀手盯着砍，第一个死。后来玩了几把杀手，真香！诶嘿嘿嘿嘿嘿嘿嘿芜湖哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈起飞。

This game is a genre on itself which is amazing, but at the same time the lack of competitors leaves the game on a lazy state of comfort. The developers have a vision for the game that is totally different from both the community and content producers, and with each update both the impressive and absurd are shown over and over again, while the game is always aiming to improve with each patch there are still bugs from several patches ago. Other than that the way that devs decide on what to change is totally based on their opinions only, wanting or not things will change they will not go back even if it's terrible.
The game is a complete mix bag, not only because of the game but how the community plays it,  if you can tolerate infuriating moments, be the bullshit of the game or simply the behavior of teammates/opponents it can be really enjoyable.
Art is amazing can't complain, but if you have a computer that struggles, you may want to pass on this one.
I love the game but it's such a disappointment
ตอนกูเล่นเนิสเป็นเหี้ยไรวะชอบพุ่งเลยไอ้สัส

Some perks were too overpowered especially for the killer. Even we have to find the special totem so that the perk will be disable, but that was still unfair. The special totem is too hard to find or maybe not able to find in some map, as I have played last game. Me and my friend were facing the Hex:devour hope perk and we are trying to find the totem, but even we've run around the map and look carefully at every place we still couldn't find it. The perk were too overpowered and that made your game unbalanced. The killer are better than the survivor them self, no need for that kind of perk.

Voll mit facecampenden Bobbas kleinen Russen die null gehirnzellen besitzen und einfach nicht verlieren können mal im ernst dieses Spiel versucht die vom Campen abzuhalten indem sie lediglich 10 von 8000 möglichen punkten verlieren.
Man spielt sich in einen guten rang hoch spielt jedoch gegen wirklich schlecht rängige Killer welche nicht wissen wie man zu Spielen hat und wenn sie einen kriegen lassen sie nicht ab sie bleiben am Hacken verlassen diesen niemals (spielen meist AOE one-hit champs) und warten einfach strategie wenn jemand kommt one hit wenn nicht auch okay
Dann erwarten sie das man noch Geld in dieses Spiel investiert nein aber nein danke nicht einen Cent investiere ich solange dieser abschaum genehmigt wird

O jogo esta desbalanceado, a empresa não da a minima pra isso, os sobreviventes tem uma vantagem infinitamente maior que o killer, Infinitos bugs que não são corrigidos e ao invés de corrigir estão colocando mais conteúdo para vender ( típico dessas empresas hoje em dia). Essa empresa é uma piada e não fazem nada pra balancear o jogo. Não percam seu tempo jogando isso!
